content.question:
Imagine that your are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, your will read the topic for your presentation. You will have 4 minutes to prepare your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible.
Present your own view or perspective on Japanese leisure activities. Discuss at least FIVE aspects or examples of Japanese leisure activities.
Begin with an appropriate introduction, give details, explain your own view or perspective, and end with a concluding remark.
